name: alexandria
description: API documentation search engine with hybrid vector + full-text search. Index OpenAPI specs and markdown docs, then search them via MCP.

embedding_provider.title: Embedding Provider
embedding_provider.description: Which embedding provider to use: voyage, ollama, or transformers (default: transformers â€” works offline, no API key needed)

voyage_api_key.title: Voyage AI API Key
voyage_api_key.description: API key for Voyage AI embeddings (only needed if embedding provider is set to voyage)

db_path.title: Database Path
db_path.description: Path to the SQLite database file (defaults to alexandria.db in the bundle directory)

tools.name: list-apis
tools.description: List all indexed API documentation sources with their names and versions

tools.name: search-docs
tools.description: Search indexed API documentation using natural language. Returns relevant chunks ranked by hybrid search (vector + full-text).

tools.name: get-api-endpoints
tools.description: List all endpoints for a specific API, showing HTTP method, path, and summary
